error.signature: error TS7053: Element implicitly has an 'any' type because expression of type 'string' can't be used to index type
error.regex: TS7053.*Element implicitly has an 'any' type.*can't be used to index

verdict.summary: Using a string variable to index an object that doesn't have an index signature.

dead_ends.why_fails: Hides the type error; any future type issues on this line are also silenced
Disables a fundamental strictness check for the entire project

workarounds.action: Add an index signature to the type: { [key: string]: ValueType }
workarounds.how: Explicitly declares the object accepts string keys

workarounds.action: Use a type assertion or keyof typeof to narrow the key type
workarounds.how: obj[key as keyof typeof obj] â€” asserts the key is valid for this specific object
